description.value:
This thin, delicate blade is gilded in pure silver. When swung, glowing blue runes appear on the flat of the blade. The basket hilt is fashioned from sturdy electrum in the fanciful design of ivy leaves.

Deals piercing damage equal to 1d8 + your Strength or Dexterity modifier.

Finesse. When making an attack with a finesse weapon, you use your choice of your Strength or Dexterity modifier for the attack and damage rolls. You must use the same modifier for both rolls.

+1 to hit and +1 to damage, magical and silver weapon

 

Once per day on a successful hit, the target is imbued with a glittery fey lining. This glowing aura grants advantage on ranged attacks and lasts for one minute.

magicitems.destroyFlavorText: reaches 0 charges: it crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.
